original_text: And it came to pass the same night, that the Lord said unto him, Arise, get thee down unto the host; for I have delivered it into thine hand.
korean_text: 그 밤에 여호와께서 기드온에게 이르시되 일어나 진영으로 내려가라 내가 그것을 네 손에 넘겨 주었느니라

sentences.original_text: And it came to pass the same night
that the Lord said unto him
Arise, get thee down unto the host
for I have delivered it into thine hand
